member.name: PSS_HANDLE_FLAGS
member.summary: Flags to specify what parts of a PSS_HANDLE_ENTRY structure are valid.

member.name: PSS_HANDLE_FLAGS.PSS_HANDLE_HAVE_BASIC_INFORMATION
member.summary: The Attributes, GrantedAccess, HandleCount, PointerCount, PagedPoolCharge, and NonPagedPoolCharge members are valid.

member.name: PSS_HANDLE_FLAGS.PSS_HANDLE_HAVE_TYPE_SPECIFIC_INFORMATION
member.summary: The TypeSpecificInformation member is valid (either Process, Thread, Mutant, Event or Section).
